feedback_items.title: Main Navigation
feedback_items.description:
Create a main navigation for an innovative retail banking app. Besides the already existing “Overview” the navigation should include the main customer needs structured as following:
1. Today
1.1 My Accounts & Cards
1.2 MY Budget
2. Rainy Day
2.1 My Insurance
2.2 My Overdraft
3. One Day
3.1 My Investments
3.2 My Housing

Also it should contain the following 4 elements:
4. Messenger
5. Language
6.Privacy 
7. Logout 

Items Overview, 1,2 & 3 should be more prominent then the rest. 

For now put a placeholder text upon click on the navigation Item, later we will together develope one section at a time.

feedback_items.title: Real estate scraper
feedback_items.description:
Our customers shall have the possibility to send us a link of the real estate, which they want to finance, and we provide them a financing offer, based on the real estate price, mentioned on the platform.

Let us implement a prototype (standalone), which
-  takes a link to a specific real estste on a 3rd party portal as an input (ask the user).  A link looks like this e.g. (https://immobilien.derstandard.at/detail/15006491)
- scrapes the most important details of the real estate (the scraping is for real, the functionality shall be implemented)
- shows the real estate in a nice design to the user and  asks for confirmation 
- if confirmed, a financing offer is presented (with 3,5% fixed interest rate and 30y tenor)
- the CTA is „send me the offer“ (this functionality shall not be implemented)
feedback_items.completion_notes:
Completed with CORS proxy fix
Initial: Commit 8df7128
Fix: Commit eca7b2b - Replaced failing CORS proxy, added demo fallback mode
✓ Multiple CORS proxies with automatic failover
✓ Demo mode when scraping unavailable
✓ User-visible demo notice banner

feedback_items.title: Fix Real Estate Scraper - Incorrect CSS Selectors for derstandard.at
feedback_items.description:
The real-estate-financing.html prototype fails to scrape property data from immobilien.derstandard.at. The CSS selectors don't match the actual DOM structure.

REQUIRED FIXES:
- Address: Use .heading-section-address instead of .object-location
- Price/Area/Rooms: Use .sc-stat with .sc-stat-label and .sc-stat-value pattern
- Image: Extract from picture > source srcset attribute (not img src)

See attached specification (real_estate_scraper_fix.md) for complete implementation details and code examples. Also uploaded to the server at /var/www/smartprototypes.net/public_html/UI_Prototypes/Banking_Prototypes/real_estate_scraper_fix.md

Test URL: https://immobilien.derstandard.at/detail/15006491

✗ Verification: FAILED - Unknown

feedback_items.title: Kick and save
feedback_items.description: Create this money automation feature which automates savings based on your favorite national team shooting a goal. Let me choose competition FIFA World Cup 2026 and later I would like to choose Austria as my Favorite Club. Later you choose how much you want to save when your club scores a goal. And which target account the amount should be deposited on. Finally you get a confirmation screen summarising the rule and then if the club scores you get a emotional push notification. Iterate this with your senior designers and come up with a functional html prototype
